channel.title: I can't get my shop to work, somebody please help!
channel.description: Okay. I have made the shop, and set prices, and added items into the shop. All of the other shops work, except this one. When I buy an item, it doesn't take the money out of my inventory. It does in fact require that amount, but it doesn't take it away once purchased.. AND It says there are '10' items in the shop. And when you buy one that number does not change. Somebody please help me.

item.title: I can't get my shop to work, somebody please help!
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

why would it work with all shops, then not that one? I dont understand it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 07:59:08 pm[/size][hr]UGHH. Please someone help. This is making my server look bad…

All of the other shops work, except this one.
